yourGroups.description: Let's help each other on the journey to meditation by sharing best practices, our favorite apps, meditation tracks, speak to what's working and not, and more!
In this community, we know being a black man and dealing with mental health is challenging. We're here to support each other and share learnings.

posts.content: Things are good. Today I wnat to visit a new place to meditate. Does anyone else meditate outside?

posts.author: David
posts.content: To tune in to meditation, you can take a bath and drink a mug of warm tea. Try not to eat 2-3 hours before bed. Limit the use of gadgets for a cleaner mind before practice. While performing meditation, it is not necessary to sit in the lotus position - it is enough to find a comfortable position for yourself (just do not meditate lying down, so as not to fall asleep ahead of time).
At Joyn people find a support network that they may not have in real life. This network provides safety and allows to learn all the aspects of mental health from each other.
